mapper.insert: insert into course_res(course_res_id, res_video_name, res_file_name, course_id, res_blues) values (null, #{resVideoName}, #{resFileName}, #{courseId}, #{resBlues})
mapper.select: select course_id, course.teacher_id, course_name, teacher_name,course_image from course left join teacher on course.teacher_id = teacher.teacher_id

SELECT c.course_id, c.teacher_id, c.course_name, t.teacher_name FROM course c LEFT JOIN teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT cs.course_id FROM course_stu cs GROUP BY cs.course_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 3 ) tmp ON c.course_id = tmp.course_id;
select course_name, t.teacher_id, course_info, teacher_name,course_image,course.course_id from course left join teacher t on course.teacher_id = t.teacher_id where course_id = #{courseId}

SELECT course.course_id, teacher.teacher_id, course_name, teacher_name FROM course, course_stu, teacher WHERE course.teacher_id = teacher.teacher_id AND student_id = #{studentId} AND course_stu.`course_id` = course.`course_id`
